tool_description: Manages proficiency testing programs including sample tracking, result submission, and performance evaluation against peer groups.

pt_program.description: Proficiency testing program name or identifier

test_name.description: Name of the test performed on PT sample

reported_result.description: Laboratory's reported result for the PT sample

result_units.description: Units of measurement for the reported result

error_messages: Invalid PT program: The specified pt_program is not recognized.
Invalid sample ID: The sample_id does not exist for the specified PT program.
Invalid submission date: submission_date must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time format.
Invalid acceptable range: acceptable_range_percent must be between 1 and 50.
Missing required data: All required fields must be provided and non-empty.
Late submission: Result submission is past the deadline for this PT program.
usage: Provide PT program details, sample information, test results, and submission data. The tool manages PT participation and evaluates performance against standards.

pt_record_id.description: Unique identifier for this PT record

compliance_status.description: Regulatory compliance status for this PT
